content: available in portuguese english and spanish you will receive a pdf file 7 pages with well-explained crochet description illustrated with photos you can sell freely your amigurumi made from this pattern this tiny tree is about 5cm 1 9 inches tall using a crochet hook size 1 25 mm using the same pattern you can make smaller or larger amigurumis using different hook sizes and compatible yarns you need to know previously the basic crochet stitches if you have doubts you can send your question on our social media don t forget to show me your tiny when sharing your work tag tiny on social media i hope you enjoy instagram @amigurumi tiny tiktok @amigurumi tiny pinterest @amigurumitiny
